text:
Hey Eleanor, its nice to meet you too!
For a quick intro, my name is Juba, been working as an animator at Framestore for 2 years now, and in the industry for about 4 years. I studied 3D animation at Vancouver Film School in Canada, where I made my first short.
And although I have some experience I still have a lot to learn too! I think it's important you know that I can only share my perspective on things, and I might not know all the answers, but I'll definitely try the best I can!
So please feel free to ask me about anything you have doubts on, or want answers to
If you'd like, tell me a about yourself too, it would be great to see any work/ projects you've done, I read on the thing that you draw?
